description: Non-Factory Trim sequential gearbox
Non-Factory Trim non-sequential (H pattern) Dogbox gearbox
Dual clutch transmission - DSG, DCT, PDK, etc
7 speed or more automatic transmission - GM HydraMatic 10L90 and 10L80, Ford 10R80, ZF HP8, Mercedes 7G-Tronic etc
Automated single clutch manual transmission - SMG, Ferrari F1, Lambo E-Gear etc
Manual tranmission with factory autoblip (Nissan 370Z, BMW M2, C7 Corvette, Porsche) or aftermarket add-on
5 or 6 speed manual transmission
3 or 4 speed manual transmission
Automatic transmission with 6 speeds or less
CVT Transmission
Non-Factory Trim/modified final drive ratio
Non-Factory Trim/modified LSD if vehicle is equipped with LSD from the factory or was a factory option
Non-Factory Trim/modified LSD if vehicle is not equipped with LSD from the factory or was not a factory option
Non-Factory Trim/modified traction control (ie via Non-Factory Trim ECU mapping)
Non-Factory Trim/modified electronically controlled center differential mapping (ie GEMS center diff controller for Mitsubishi Evo, Subaru STi)
Non-Factory Trim/modified half shafts or driveshafts including carbon fiber and aluminium driveshafts
Relocation of transmission location via altered mounts
Non-Factory Trim/modified clutch, pressure plate, and/or clutch assembly
Non-Factory Trim/modified flywheel
Non-Factory Trim/modified motor, transmission, differential, and/or other drivetrain mounts, including metallic and non-metallic mounts
Non-Factory Trim/modified shifter, including bushings, lever, etc.
Enabling or disabling of Factory Trim traction control
